com.revature.DAO

Interface AudiCarDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudiCarDAOPostGreSQL

    public interface AudiCarDAO
    An Audi Car Data-Access-Object. The user of this interface has both access and control over any car's information that's within the RDS database.

    The AudiCarDAO interface provides a method for inserting a car's information into the RDS database.

    The AudiCarDAO interface provides a method for deleting a car's information from the RDS database.

    The AudiCarDAO interface provides a method for retrieving an car's id given by the RDS database.

    The AudiCarDAO interface provides two methods for retrieving an Audi's information from the RDS database and creating an Audi object for further use.

    The AudiCarDAO interface provides three methods for retrieving a list of Audi car information from the RDS database and returning an ArrayList of AudiCar objects for further use (where each AudiCar object holds a particular set of information).

    Author:
    josecanela

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCar(AudiCar audi)
      Creates an Audi object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC.
      void deleteCar(java.lang.String carVin)
      Deletes an Audi with a particular vehicle identification number.
      java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readAllCars()
      Gets all the Audi cars from the RDS database.
      java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readAllCarsOnLot()
      Gets all the Audi cars on the Audi dealership lot.
      AudiCar readCar(java.lang.String carVin)
      Gets an Audi object's information using its vehicle identification number and returns an Audi object
      AudiCar readCarByCarId(int carId)
      Gets an Audi object's information by its ID and returns an Audi object
      java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readCarsOwned(java.lang.String customerUsername)
      Gets all the Audi cars that have been bought by a particular customer
      int readOwnedCarId(java.lang.String customerUsername)
      Gets an Audi's ID

        Deletes an Audi with a particular vehicle identification number.
        Parameters:

      • readAllCars

        java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readAllCars()
        Gets all the Audi cars from the RDS database.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the cars in the RDS database

      • readAllCarsOnLot

        java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readAllCarsOnLot()
        Gets all the Audi cars on the Audi dealership lot.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the cars that have not been bought in the RDS database

      • readCarsOwned

        java.util.ArrayList<AudiCar> readCarsOwned(java.lang.String customerUsername)
        Gets all the Audi cars that have been bought by a particular customer
        Parameters:
        customerUsername - a customer's username
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the cars that have been bought by a particular customer in the RDS database
